comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: elixr on August 15, 2022, 08:51:48 PMI would like to post some threads with my thread designs on them, I need 1 merit however to post my images, how do i get this?You are a newbie you won't be able to post any image but only the URL of the image. The above is optional if you want to instantly be able to post image you need to pay for copper membership. Getting merit is not easy you need to be constructive or helpful and reply some useful response to every thread/post if someone found your post helpful I'm sure you will earn not just 1 merit but more than 1 merit.
